name: Julian Hall
title: Any
coverLetter:
Hello my name is Julian Hall I'm very interested in the position available. I have much experience in budtending, delivery driving and vending as well as trimming packaging etc. One of the most respectful reliable and dependable people you'll meet. I'm very comfortable with an upbeat/busy/crowded environment and can work efficiently under those circumstances. I'm available for full-time shifts and I'm looking for stability in the industry such as working in a store. Here's my resume,
thank you


Julian Ronald Hall

          Newport Beach , CA 93663​​​​​​​​ Psychology and Business Marketing                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              ​​         Citrus College
310.490.8092
Julianhall32@gmail.com
3/9/93 

OBJECTIVE

To contribute my entrepreneurial spirit to a growing company where to there is room for advancement and I can grow into a career. 

SKILLS

Excellent verbal and written communication skills. Ability to prioritize under pressure.  Business to business sales experience.  Go getter, leads by example, quick learner and ability to adapt to any situation. Extensive canvassing and door to door experience.  Excellent customer service and sales skills. Team player and motivates others. 
​ 
WORK EXPERIENCE
Warehouse manager, D&G delivery LLC.                                                                        Oct. 2015- Aug. 2017
       • Supervise employees, delivery drivers, receptionists.
       • Keep records or upcoming and previous orders
       • Lift over 75 lbs & keep organization of product incoming and outgoing

Sales and Marketing, KUSHTOWN Sodas Inc.                                      ​​​​  June 2013- Current
• Developed sales plan, made cold calls to potential customers.
• Kept sales records, placed orders. Showed samples.
• Accounts Receivables and made deliveries.
• Customer service and follow up-collected feedback from customer to present to owner.
• Consulted in making of all marketing material. 
• Maintained and developed long term relationship with all accounts. 

Marketing Canvasser, Peak Power Solutions​​​​                                          April 2014-June 2014
• Lead canvasser, 30 new leads a week. 
• Assisted in mapping territory.
• $26,000 new business generated in first month. 

Sales Associate Footwear, Sport Chalet​​​​​​           March  2012- June 2012
• Outstanding customer service.
• Promoted and friendly and fun environment, maximizing the customer experience.
• Lead in all merchandising and floor moves.

Referee, Chino Valley National Junior Basketball     ​​​​​​​  2010-Seasonal
• Confer with other sporting officials, coaches, players and facility managers in order to provide information, coordinate activities and discuss problems.
• Inspect sporting equipment and examine participants in order to ensure compliance with event and safety regulation.
• Officiate at sporting events to maintain standards of play and ensure that rules are observed.
• Developed positive reputation and strong relationships with other officials, coaches and players.

Hobbies

Love for animals and nature and agriculture.  Meditation and Playing sports.   Going to the beach with my dogs.

additionalInfo:
I do a very good job of trimming and taking directions.
I am a quick learner you only have to tell me one time for me to understand
I have a smooth mouthpiece I can sell water to a dolphin
I do have certification and licensing I just want to learn as much information I can and apply the information I have gained to move forward in the industry
